description:
Processing and analysing streaming data with Python and Apache Flink -
PyCon Italia 2022

Data used to be a batch thing, but more and more we get unbounded
streams of data, fast or slow, that we need to process and analyse in
near real time.

In this talk I’ll show you how you can use Apache Flink and QuestDB to
build reliable streaming data pipelines that can grow as much as you
need. Data used to be a batch thing, but more and more we get unbounded
streams of data, fast or slow, that we need to process and analyse in
near real time.

In this talk I’ll show you how you can use Apache Flink and QuestDB to
build reliable streaming data pipelines that can grow as much as your
Python application needs.

Speaker: Javier Ramirez
title: Processing and analysing streaming data with Python and Apache Flink
